title: Tennessee's governor has halted executions for an independent review into lethal injections following an inmate's last-minute reprieve - CNN
content:
1. Tennessee's governor has halted executions for an independent review into lethal injections following an inmate's last-minute reprieve  CNN
  2. GOP governor suspends all 2022 executions, announces investigation  Fox News
  3. 2022 executions paused in Tennessee  WBIR Channel 10
  4. ‘I don’t know if we’re ever going to see this actually happen’: Families of victims react to execution delays  WKRN News 2
  5. Tennessee to stop executions pending review of lethal injection procedures  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Tennessee's governor has announced a pause of executions in the state amid plans for an independent review into the lethal injection process after finding that testing procedures for a set execution last month weren't followed.
